Zelda.level¶

Zelda.level.Camera¶

This module is used to draw movements.

class Zelda.level.Camera.YSortBulletsCameraGroup[source]¶

Bases: Group

Make camera draw bullets with offset.

Draw bullets.

Parameters:

player – Player

class Zelda.level.Camera.YSortCameraGroup[source]¶

Bases: Group

Make camera draw the map, obstacles and visibles with offset.

Zelda.level.Level¶

This module is used to draw the map.

class Zelda.level.Level.Level(locale: str, game: Game)[source]¶

Bases: object

Level class.

bullets_update()[source]¶

Update bullets.

companion_call()[source]¶

Call the companion.

create_map()[source]¶

Create a map.

death()[source]¶

Call death screen.

esc_menu_call()[source]¶

Call escape menu.

run(dt: float)[source]¶

Draw the map, player, obstacles and visibles, bullets according to the movement of the player.

Parameters:

dt – delta time for main loop updating

update_locale(lang: str)[source]¶

Update the language of the game death screen, escape menu and companion.

Parameters:

lang – language of the game

Zelda.level.Support¶

This module is used to import from folders and csv files.

Zelda.level.Support.import_csv_layout(path: str) → list[list[str]][source]¶

Import terrain objects from the csv file.

Parameters:

path – str: path to map’s layer csv file

Return terrain_map:

list of lists of data, which means if the tile on the layer of the map contains something

Zelda.level.Support.import_folder(path: str) → dict[str, 'pygame.image'][source]¶

Import images from the folder.

Parameters:

path – str: path to the folder with image.

Return surf_dict:

dictionary of pygame.image with the key of filename converted to string
